about_the_game:
About

Monster Cube has a simple promise, to put the demon that is boredom at bay.

  • Simple arrow controls
  • Scoring system
  • Addicting
  • No hassle with menus

All that is required by you is to "consume" the incoming projectiles before they hit you 3 times...then it starts all over again.

Premise

You are a Cronenberg monster meat cube that devours incoming projectiles at an increasingly aggressive pace. With a simple control scheme using the basic arrow keys on a standard keyboard to devour the incoming projectiles in 4 directions. Inspired by the heavy hours tapping away on my own desktop icons while talking or thinking.

To start this game its a simple load and straight into the game with no menus just you with a Score and High Score counter. Compare your high score with friends or brag about each time you achieved a funny number.

The Future



Designed to be a simple experience while you talk with your friends in the background or simply want to reach a new high score future bug fixed and quality of life improvement are the primary goal.

name: Monster Cube

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
